time_segments.heading: Time: 0-60 sec
time_segments.summary: Change the engine oil in your vehicle is one of the most important and necessary procedures to keep your vehicle running and on the road. Whether you have a car, a truck, a van, or an SUV, basic principles are the same and we're going to show you how to do it yourself. Why would you want to do it yourself? You're not going to save a ton of money, but doing it yourself, you're going to have peace of mind knowing the job was done right.

time_segments.heading: Time: 60-120 sec
time_segments.summary: The image depicts a person inspecting the engine compartment of a vehicle, using gloves to lift the engine cover and examine the components underneath.

time_segments.heading: Time: 120-180 sec
time_segments.summary: The video segment is approximately 120-180 seconds long, focusing on the process of removing and replacing an oil filter from a vehicle's engine.

time_segments.heading: Time: 180-240 sec
time_segments.summary: The person is inspecting and handling equipment, possibly preparing to install or replace parts, and is wearing protective gear to ensure their safety.

time_segments.heading: Time: 240-300 sec
time_segments.summary: The person is using a white cloth and a black glove to wipe down the engine of a vehicle, demonstrating the importance of safety precautions when working with mechanical components.
